display.title: Miserable pile of secrets
description: §2Woodland Mansions§r are dark oak fortresses full of §3many room types§r with §dspecial loot§r, §cIllagers§r, and traps.
They can be found using §3Woodland Explorer Maps§r sold by §aCartographers§r.
Rooms can contain many useful, including §3Bookshelves§r, §3Crops§r, and §3Loot Chests§r - often §dtucked in corners§r.
In rare rooms, §dDiamond Blocks§r can be found encased in §3Obsidian§r or §3lava§r.
